participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Alex enjoys spending time with friends and is always looking for fun activities to do together.
participant_1.background: I work took i have a part time job at burger king. They are constantly on my back. I do not drink or do drugs or anything. I just want to have fun with my friends. I am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home.

participant_2.name: Emma Smith
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and caring, Emma has a strong desire to help others and excels academically. She's also known for her friendly and warm demeanor.
participant_2.background: My current goal is to run a k. When i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. I am currently in high school. I make straight as in school. I won homecoming queen this year.

content.text: I'm currently in high school, and I want to be a physical therapist when I grow up. I make straight A's in school, and I won homecoming queen this year.
Wow, that's amazing! I'm really impressed. What do you like about physical therapy?
I like helping people, and I think it's a really important job. I'm also interested in sports, so I think it would be a good fit for me.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great physical therapist.
Thanks! I hope so. What do you do for fun?
I have a part-time job at Burger King, but I mostly just hang out with my friends. I like to go to the movies, play video games, and go to concerts.
That sounds like fun! I don't really go out much, but I do like to watch movies and play video games.
We should get together sometime and watch a movie or play some video games.
That sounds like fun! I'm free this weekend.
Great! I'll text you my number.
